pages.title: Old Champion's Remains
pages.text: Level: <level_t4>$(br2)Spawns in $(copy:Champion's Grave)Champion's Grave$()[$(copy:soulsweapons:champions_grave)soulsweapons:champions_grave$()].$(br2)You can locate this structure in the $(bold)Overworld$() using a $(key)Moonstone Compass$() or $(mage/spell#locate)Spell Locate$().$(br2)Alternatively, use $(key)Draugr$() on the $(key)Old Moon Altar$() to summon.

$(br)$(key)Old Champion's Remains$() adapts to damage from the same weapon ($(bold)mainhand item$()). Unlike the $(mechanic/hostility#adaptive)Adaptive$() trait, you can break this adaptation simply by switching to a different mainhand item to deal damage.$(br2)Upon death, $(key)Old Champion's Remains$() spawns a $(key)Frenzied Shade$().$(br2)$(key)Frenzied Shade$() can $(bold)phase through walls$() and inflicts multiple debuffs such as $(bold)Blindness$() and $(bold)Wither$() on attack.

pages.title: Atomic Breastplate & Essence of Eventide
pages.text: $(br)Defeating $(key)Old Champion's Remains$() drops an $(key)Atomic Breastplate$(), an important early defensive item for mages.$(br2)Defeating $(key)Frenzied Shade$() drops $(key)Essence of Eventide$(), which can be used to summon $(boss/t3/moon_knight)Fallen Icon$().
